titleStmt.title: Third Judicial District of New York

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Third Judicial District of New York

body.p: This State of New York judicial district encompasses Albany, Rensselaer, Ulster, Greene, Columbia, Schoharie, and Sullivan counties. Established by the state constitution of 1846.

ab.bibl:
Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of the State of New-York at Law and in Equity :
as Established by the Court at July Term, 1847, (Albany, NY: H. H. Van Dyck, Printer, 1847), 9-13 of Schedule.
Laws of the State of New-York Passed at the First Meeting of the Seventieth Session of the Legislature, vol. 1 & 2, (Albany, NY: Charles van Bethuysen, Printer, 1847), 319-46.
The Third Constitution of the State of New York, Article 6, https://www.nycourts.gov/history/legal-history-new-york/documents/Publications_1846-NY-Constitution.pdf.
